      • init

        public void init​(java.lang.String theme,
                 java.lang.String highlight,
                 java.lang.String language,
                 int index)
        Initialize the settings pages with styles and the currently active settings. 'Remember' -variables are for returning the settings to the original state if changes are not applied / cancelled
        Parameters:
        theme - {String} color of the theme
        highlight - {String} color of the highlights
        language - {String} setting that is currently active
        index - {int} of the locale setting
